name: CO2 per employee
description: Estimated amount of CO2 emissions per employee per year

name: Water consumption per employee
description: Estimated amount of water consumption

name: Energy use per square meter
description: Average energy use per square meter of office space

name: Waste recycling rate
description: Percentage of waste that is recycled

name: Employee turnover rate
description: Annual percentage of employees leaving the company

name: Renewable energy usage
description: Percentage of energy from renewable sources

name: Carbon footprint
description: Total annual carbon emissions

name: Water conservation initiatives
description: Number of water conservation projects implemented

name: Resource management efficiency
description: Efficiency rating of resource management practices

name: Community engagement activities
description: Number of community engagement activities conducted annually

name: Governance score
description: Overall governance score based on industry standards

name: Supplier performance rating
description: Average performance rating of suppliers

name: Ethical supply chain compliance
description: Percentage of supply chain adhering to ethical standards

name: Labor conditions satisfaction
description: Percentage of employees satisfied with labor conditions

name: Environmental impact score
description: Score assessing the environmental impact of operations

name: Energy consumption per unit product
description: Average energy consumed per unit of product produced

name: Indoor environmental quality
description: Rating of the indoor environmental quality in facilities

name: Pollution reduction initiatives
description: Number of initiatives aimed at reducing pollution

name: Sustainability strategy score
description: Overall score for the company's sustainability strategy

name: Deforestation prevention measures
description: Number of measures taken to prevent deforestation
